term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - continuous indication analyser
term.title: continuous indication analyser

item.text: An analysis with a permanent indication related to the sample concentration. To obtain a continuous indication, the sampling and measuring cell need to be continuous. A time lag may exist between sampling and indication of measured concentration.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2174 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
